title: Ticket #3027: Relative proxy paths do not work for grid universe
description:
If you submit a job using Condor-C, it will set the proxy path to x509up_uXXXX and the Iwd to the appropriate spool directory.

However, if the job on the remote schedd is a grid universe job, the remote condor_gridmanager doesn't know how to handle a relative path, and the job will go on hold.
